Henry Cavill: Môj Geralt je verný knihám a hrám zároveň. Je výbušný, hrozivý a viac toho povie, keď je ticho
07 Nov 2019, 19:05 by Dominik Vetrák

Henry Cavill sa rozpovedal o tom, ako stvárnil Geralta.

Pre Henryho Cavilla je rola Geralta splneným snom. Je náruživým hráčom, prešiel celú trilógiu, prečítal všetky knihy a postavu si zamiloval. Akonáhle sa dozvedel o seriálovej adaptácii, jeho agent mal vraj dosť blbé obdobie, kedy ho Cavill denno-denne otravoval s tým, aby ho do projektu dostal. Nakoniec sa to podarilo a najslávnejšieho zabijaka monštier stvárni bývalý Superman. 
Vďaka portálu Redanian Intelligence sme sa z rôznych rozhovorov s hercom dozvedeli mnohé zaujímavosti nielen o jeho postave. Cavill tvrdí, že seriál je zaujímavý aj pre tých, ktorí neholdujú fantasy.
Je plný konfliktov, rasizmu, kolonizácie, sociálnej nespravodlivosti, mágie a podobne. Cavill si dobre uvedomuje, koho hrá. Geralt dokáže byť cynický, sarkastický, až nepríjemný. Niekedy však jeho gestikulácia a mimika hovoria za neho slovami, aké by nedokázal spojiť do vety. A presne tak to bude aj v seriáli. Showrunnerka opätovne potvrdila, že sa nemáme tešiť na nič, čo by bolo priamo z hier alebo na ne odkazovalo. 



V ďalšom rozhovore pre Hobby Consolas hovoril o spracovaní najnovšej verzie tohto sveta. Cavillov Geralt je verný knihám, no zároveň tvrdí, že aj hrám. Je to jeho unikátna verzia postavy, no verí, že si v nej niečo nájdu fanúšikovia oboch médií. Rovnako ako seriál ako taký, aj Geralt sa primárne drží kníh.
PS: Henry Cavill je znamenitý hráč. Konkrétne hráva na PC. Spomína, ako so svojimi 4 bratmi na neradosť ich matky spojili cez LAN všetkých svojich 5 počítačov na jednom kuchynskom stole a hrávali tam celé dni. PS2: Bol to práve Henry Cavill, ktorý vybral svojho koňa menom Roach/Klepna.

Henry Cavill: My Geralt is faithful to books and games at the same time. He's explosive, threatening, and he'll say more when it's quiet
07 Nov 2019, 19:05 by Dominik Vetrák

Henry Cavill talked about how he portrayed Geralt.

For Henry Cavill, the role of Geralt is a dream come true. He is a passionate player, he went through the whole trilogy, read all the books and loved the character. As soon as he learned of the serial adaptation, his agent was supposed to have had a pretty bad time when Cavill had annoyed him daily to get him into the project. Eventually, it succeeded, and the most famous monster killer portrays the former Superman.
Thanks to the Redanian Intelligence portal we learned from various interviews with the actor many interesting facts not only about his character. Cavill claims that the show is also interesting for those who don't like fantasy.
It is full of conflicts, racism, colonization, social injustice, magic and the like. Cavill is well aware of who he is playing. Geralt can be cynical, sarcastic, even unpleasant. Sometimes, however, his gestures and facial expressions speak for him in words he could not put into a sentence. And that's exactly how it will be in the series. The showrunner reaffirmed that we should not look forward to anything that would be directly from the games or refer to them.



In another interview for Hobby, Consolas talked about processing the latest version of this world. Cavill's Geralt is faithful to books, but at the same time he claims to play. It's his unique version of the character, but he believes that fans of both media will find something in it. Like the show itself, Geralt is primarily concerned with books.
PS: Henry Cavill is an excellent player. Specifically, it plays on a PC. She remembers how her four brothers hate their mother's displeasure to connect all five of their computers on the same kitchen table over the LAN and play for days. PS2: It was Henry Cavill who chose his horse named Roach / Klepna.
